results.title: Anything can happen in life
results.creator_credit: Zenebech Tebeje, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Zenebech Tebeje reflects on growing up in her large family and how quickly life can change. But if you can adapt and embrace your new life, you can do anything.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Zenebech Tebeje, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Zenebech Tebeje reflects on growing up in her large family and how quickly life can change. But if you can adapt and embrace your new life, you can do anything.

results.title: Train the trainer : Digital Storytelling project
results.brief_description: These seven stories are a culmination of a Digital Storytelling ‘Train the trainer’ workshop, held at ACMI in April 2008. The stories are of a personal nature and are centred around an important part of the participant’s lives.

results.title: [The Working women's centre]
results.creator_credit: Laura Butterworth, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: As the Working Women’s Centre in South Australia faces budget cuts, Laura Butterworth reflects on the history of the centre, the stories of the women workers and the battles fought and won.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Laura Butterworth, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: As the Working Women’s Centre in South Australia faces budget cuts, Laura Butterworth reflects on the history of the centre, the stories of the women workers and the battles fought and won.

results.title: Who's that girl?
results.creator_credit: Sarah Sneddon, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Sarah Sneddon delves back into the wonderfully bizarre world of her childhood, with its tutus, false eyelashes, hair nets, exams, glitz and glamour.

results.title: The Keeper of the rings
results.creator_credit: Kathleen Comber, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: For her pa, her dad and, most importantly, her mum, Kathleen Comber is the keeper of the rings. They encapsulate the pain and joys of her family thorughout the generations.

results.title: Journeys into the unknown : Digital Storytelling project
results.brief_description: Eight members of the community tell their stories of living with HIV. With a fierce zest for life and adventure, they tell of how their lives have changed but also of how they have fought back against the disease and look forward to the journey ahead.
results.title_for_label: Journeys into the unknown : Digital Storytelling project
results.description: Eight members of the community tell their stories of living with HIV. With a fierce zest for life and adventure, they tell of how their lives have changed but also of how they have fought back against the disease and look forward to the journey ahead.
description_for_label: Eight members of the community tell their stories of living with HIV. With a fierce zest for life and adventure, they tell of how their lives have changed but also of how they have fought back against the disease and look forward to the journey ahead.
